duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a content strategy aligned with the brand's voice, objectives, and target audience.
Create high-quality, original content for various channels, ensuring accuracy, relevance, and adherence to brand guidelines.
Conduct in-depth research on industry trends and best practices to ensure content accuracy and engagement.
Collaborate with internal stakeholders, subject matter experts, and the marketing team to gather insights and information for content creation.
Edit and proofread content for clarity, grammar, style, and brand consistency.
Optimize content for SEO and monitor content performance to drive engagement and conversions.
Stay updated with industry news and developments to identify content opportunities and trends.
Ensure compliance with regulatory changes and guidelines in the financial industry.
Update and maintain website content using the CMS.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in journalism, communications, marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred). Portfolio showcasing a range of high-quality content pieces.
